sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Seizure and Forfeiture Reporting Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Seizure and Forfeiture Reporting Act.

sections.heading: Applicability. This Act is applicable to property seized or forfeited under the following provisions of law:
sections.text: Applicability. This Act is applicable to property seized or forfeited under the following provisions of law:

sections.heading: Applicability. This Act and the changes made to this Act by Public Act 100-699 only apply to property seized on and after July 1, 2018.
sections.text: Applicability. This Act and the changes made to this Act by Public Act 100-699 only apply to property seized on and after July 1, 2018.

sections.heading: The Criminal Code of 2012 is amended  by repealing Sections 36-1a and 36-5.
sections.text: The Criminal Code of 2012 is amended by repealing Sections 36-1a and 36-5.

sections.heading: The Code of Criminal Procedure of 1963 is amended  by repealing Section 124B-1030.
sections.text: The Code of Criminal Procedure of 1963 is amended by repealing Section 124B-1030.

sections.heading: No acceleration or delay. Where this Act makes changes in a statute that is represented in this Act by text that is not yet or no longer in effect (for example, a Section represented by multiple versions), the use of that text does not accelerate or delay the taking effect of (i) the changes made by
sections.text: No acceleration or delay. Where this Act makes changes in a statute that is represented in this Act by text that is not yet or no longer in effect (for example, a Section represented by multiple versions), the use of that text does not accelerate or delay the taking effect of (i) the changes made by this Act or (ii) provisions derived from any other Public Act.

sections.heading: No revival or extension. This Act does not revive or extend any Section or Act otherwise repealed.
sections.text: No revival or extension. This Act does not revive or extend any Section or Act otherwise repealed.

sections.heading: Savings clause. The provisions of this Act are subject to Section 4 of the Statute on Statutes.
sections.text: Savings clause. The provisions of this Act are subject to Section 4 of the Statute on Statutes.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect July 1, 2018.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect July 1, 2018.
